GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Strategy-focused board games that prioritise limited-randomness

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews sorted by date from newest to oldest

reviews.title: Ticket To Ride
reviews.review_body: Choo-chooing onto game tables and zooming its way to becoming a modern classic. Ticket To Ride is rich with trains, tickets and tactics. Players gather train cards to enable then to build routes across a North American map, joining big cities and trying not to get blocked by their opponent

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object for the given review_id
